benifit: There are numerous benefits of content consolidation for businesses. From the surface, it may seem like a lot of work; however, once done right, your site will get great exposure and traffic. Some other benefits include:
Keyword_rankings: Content consolidation will help boost your keyword ranking. This happens when search engines understand your content better. When you have multiple pages that are about similar topics, search engines will either have a difficult time choosing one or not choosing it at all.
Better User Experience: Consolidated content makes the user experience an easy and enjoyable process. Users typically tend to interact well with a website that gives them a clear and detailed answer when they look for something. A well-developed content may even make the users sign up for a service or purchase a product you are offering
Increased_Organic_Traffic: One of the biggest advantages of consolidating content is that it brings more organic traffic. Especially if your content has been consolidated the right way, your site will have tremendous traffic growth within a few weeks.
Approach_Content: If you are thinking about consolidating your content, there are a few basic things you should know. They are:
